nodes.name: Extract and Enhance the blog content

parameters.content:
## Workflow Documentation: Automated Blog-to-Landing-Page Generator
### Overview

This workflow automates the process of generating a blog-based landing page from a user‚Äôs interest topic. It fetches trending articles, enhances them with AI, creates HTML + image content, and emails the results to the user.

## Workflow steps

 ### Form Submission (Trigger)
  - The workflow starts when a user submits their email and interest topic.

 ### HTTP Request (SerpApi)
  - Uses SerpApi to search trending articles/blogs related to the user‚Äôs chosen topic.
Example: searching ‚ÄúTechnology AI‚Äù returns top Google News results.

 ### Gemini API (Extract & Enhance)
  - AI selects one article and expands it into structured blog content:
title, introduction, body, conclusion.

### Gemini API (Generate HTML)
  - Uses the structured JSON to create a modern single-page HTML blog layout.

### Function Node (Clean HTML)
  - Cleans and validates the HTML response, saving it with .html extension.

### HTTP Request (Hugging Face - Image Generator)
  - Generates a relevant blog image based on the chosen topic.

### Function Node (Rename Image File)
  - Cleans the image response and renames it with .png extension.###

### Merge Node (HTML + Image)
  - Combines the cleaned HTML and PNG into a single workflow branch.

### Function Node (Prepare Attachments)
  - Packages the .html and .png files into one output so they can be sent together.

### Gmail Node (Send Email)
  - Sends an email to the submitted user address with the blog HTML and image PNG attached.

## Final Output
  - A mobile-friendly blog landing page (.html) file.

  - A generated blog image (.png) file.

  - Both are sent as attachments to the user‚Äôs email.
